QuestData.Title: The Lost Legion
QuestData.Description: The heroic men and women of the 7th Legion stayed at the front of the ship to fight off storm drakes while the crew evacuated.$B$BNone of them have returned.$B$BPlease find them, $p!
QuestData.RewardText: <Though his eyes are open, the soldier does not respond to your presence. An electrical field buzzes around him.>
